nodes.text: Crickbeets were a type of nocturnal critter known for their constant chirping, which would suddenly stop if they sensed danger. One type of crickbeet was the Lothalian crickbeet. It could be found in Capital City on the Outer Rim planet Lothal. One night, Imperial stormtrooper TK-626 was patrolling a TIE fighter airfield, listening to the crickbeets. When they stopped chirping, he sensed something was amiss, alerting his partner, MB-223, before the airfield was attacked by Mandalorian Sabine Wren.
